channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned bikes at parking next to Queens Road Peckham station, 11th July
item.description:
These bikes have been locked at the bike parking between Tesco and Queens Road Peckham station for months. They have been stripped to just their frames so they're clearly abandoned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 151-155, Queen's Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sacks of rubbish left on Hollydale Road, 11th July
item.description:
Several sacks of rubbish left next to the bin in Hollydale Road again. I'm concerned a fox will get into them again (like one did with other bags last night).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hollydale Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over flowing bins, 11th July
item.description:
Clearly not emptying the bins as should be. Shocking that we line your pockets but you cannot do the job properly. This is awful as on a pavement. It stinks and is attracting pests. Absolutely disgusting for the local residents living nearby.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Salisbury Road, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Red light out, 11th July
item.description:
Red light not working on the traffic lights at the junction of Waterloo Road and The Cut (left hand side of the road when facing in the direction of Waterloo Station).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Waterloo Road, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Possible abandoned van, 11th July
item.description:
Not quite sure if abandoned but van is in a terrible state

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Powster Road, Sundridge, London

item.title: School sign hanging off the lamppost, 11th July
item.description:
The school sign feel off its brackets

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 86, Stewarts Road, London

item.title: Dead fox in garden, 11th July
item.description:
There is a dead fox in the bottom of our garden at 42 pilgrimage street SE1 4ll.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28-52, Pilgrimage Street, The Borough, London

item.title: Basal growth on trees on London Road blocking view of oncoming traffic., 11th July
item.description:
When exiting Hammelton Road onto London Road, view to the right is obscured by basal growth from trees. View of oncoming traffic is being blocked making it dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hammelton Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Washing machine left on pavement outside number 23., 11th July
item.description:
Been left there a couple of days next to tree. Blocking pavement making pavement unusable for wheelchair users.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hammelton Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish outside main communal door to flats, 11th July
item.description:
Someone has cleared out a flat on the 1st floor and left everything outside the communal entrance ,which is partially blocked. furniture , fittings and general rubbish all over the place. also bits thrown over the balcony onto the grass below.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hillingdon Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Reported taghing not cleaned up, 11th July
item.description:
Extensive graffiti and tagging in private property, often causing flytipping in same location

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Virgil Street, Lambeth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rotten hollow tree stump being used as dustbin, 11th July
item.description:
Hollow tree stump outside no 41 is being used to dispose trash by passerbys. It's also gone moldy and keeps wafting a disgusting, rotten smell.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alexandra Crescent, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Electric box open, 11th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Eastbourne Terrace, Paddington, London

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maidstone Road, London

item.title: Dumped Buggy, 11th July

item.title: Lordship lane estate weeds, 11th July
item.description:
Lordship lane estate is in desperate need of weeding. The grass areas are full of foxtail which is very dangerous for dogs

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Building materials on the highway, 11th July
item.description:
The property at 35 The Drive has been blocking the street outside their property so that their builders can park there. People move the bins and boards and put them on the pavement. Now they have literally ton sacks of sand and building materials on the highway, blocking the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Drive, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime bikes blocking pavement outside old Quebec street parking stand, 11th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Seymour Street, Marylebone, London

item.title: Greenwich wheelie bin, 11th July

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, St Paul's Wood Hill, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Large suitcase dumped on pavement, 11th July
item.description:
